amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for periodic step increases for non-uniformed federal employees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 569 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to fund periodic step increases described in Section 5335 of Title V of the United States Code.
